description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Crypt of the Serpent King is a medieval first-person hack'n'slash dungeon crawler. Explore randomly generated dungeons. Level up your character and fight goblins, orcs, skeletons, giant spiders and all sorts of underworld creatures using melee and ranged weapons. Hidden treasures await all those who dare to enter...
description.short: Crypt of the Serpent King is a medieval first-person hack'n'slash dungeon crawler. Explore randomly generated dungeons.
